assessmentQuestionVersion.name: FSC_FF_InvestmentFamiliarity
assessmentQuestionVersion.questionText: How familiar are you with investment matters?
assessmentQuestionVersion.responseValues: Completely unfamiliar with investments and uneasy about their complexity Not familiar with investments and the market Modest level of familiarity but lack full comprehension of investments and the market Reasonable understanding about the diverse factors that impact investment performance Very knowledgeable and self-motivated for research and other investment data to guide my investment choices
